base_description: Tall, cylindrical yellow object with a conical base.
part_description: The object consists of a long cylindrical body and a smaller conical base. The cylinder is positioned vertically atop the cone, which serves as a stable foundation.
internal_interaction_description: The cylindrical body is seamlessly attached to the conical base, providing structural stability. The base supports the cylinder, allowing it to stand upright without tipping over. The smooth transition between the cylinder and the cone ensures a balanced distribution of weight.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, interacting with its environment by standing upright. It may be used as a decorative piece or functional item, depending on context. Its bright color makes it noticeable, potentially drawing attention or serving as a visual marker.
